LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuShirtTie.label: shirt and tie
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuShirtTie.descri: During the 20th century, this piece of apparal became highly fashionable for conducting business.
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuTopHat.label: top hat
LanguageData.ROM_Apparel_CallOfCthulhuNewsboyCap.desc: Front-facing flat cap that was commonly used by newspaper delivery boys during the industrial age.
